To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Tape 1 of recordings of Bluebird 78 discs, featuring Miller's Merrymakers (performers), Hackberry Ramblers (performers), Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers (performer), New Riverside Ramblers (performers), and Jean Fuselier (performer), performing Creole tunes from the 1930's.

name.namePart: Happy Fats and his Rayne-Bo Ramblers

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
